sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, CardBody, Media, Input, FormGroup, Form, CardHeader, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'reactstrap'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Breadcrumb from '../../../../layout/breadcrumb'; import BottomAddNewPaymentMethodTabbedHelper from './helpers/bottomTabbed/bottomTabbedHelper.js'; import axios from "axios"; import { NotificationManager } from 'react-notifications'; import Sheet from 'react-modal-sheet'; const PaymentMethodsAddNewPaymentMethodHelper = ({ userData }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ nav1: null, nav2: null }); const [ paymentMethods, setPaymentMethods ] = useState([]); const [ isOpen, setIsOpen ] = useState(false); const [ cardInfo, setCardInfo ] = useState({ cvc: "", expiry: "", focus: "", name: "", number: "", cardType: "" }) const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setCardInfo(prevState => { return { ...prevState, [name]: value } }) } useEffect(() => { const config = { params: { hackerID: userData.uniqueId } } axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL}/gather/existing/payment/methods/hacker`, config).then((res) => { if (res.data.message === "Successfully gathered existing payment method's!") { console.log(res.data); const { paymentMethods } = res.data; setPaymentMethods(paymentMethods); } else { console.log("err", res.data); NotificationManager.warning("Failed to fetch your current payment method's on file, please reload this page or contact support if this problem persists...", "Failed to load previous method's!", 4750); } }).catch((err) => { console.log(err); NotificationManager.warning("Failed to fetch your current payment method's on file, please reload this page or contact support if this problem persists...", "Failed to load previous method's!", 4750); }) }, []) return ( setIsOpen(false)}>
View & manage all of your current cards from this screen!

{"Manage your payment methods, add new methods, view current methods & much more!"}

Current Primary: **** **** **** 4756

You can manage any/all card or payment related activity with this page. These are the cards/payment-methods that'll be used to purchase {process.env.REACT_APP_APPLICATION_NAME}'s {process.env.REACT_APP_CRYPTO_TOKEN_NAME} to be gambled or used as payment for completed hack's. Check out the options on this page to explore our various payment logic...

Current Active Cards    : {0} Method's
Availiable Pending Payment Slots    :     {10} Slots
Your Current {process.env.REACT_APP_CRYPTO_TOKEN_NAME} # Count    :     {1150} Token's
Current conversion per each {process.env.REACT_APP_CRYPTO_TOKEN_NAME}    :     {"$15/Token (per each token conversion)"}
{`Share your ${process.env.REACT_APP_CRYPTO_TOKEN_NAME} count/supply!`}

{"Previously Added Card(s) & Method's"}

 {typeof paymentMethods !== "undefined" && paymentMethods.length > 0 ? paymentMethods.slice(0, 3).map((payment, idx) => { return (
{payment.name}
{"Primary Method"}

{`${payment.lastFour}`}

{`Exp. ${payment.expiry}`} Card Type: {payment.cardType} ); }) :
}
setIsOpen(true)} className="view-all-card-text">View ALL Card's/Method's
); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userData: state.auth.data } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { })(PaymentMethodsAddNewPaymentMethodHelper);
